detail_desc: Sleeveless sports tops in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section at the front, a mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem with embossed text. Medium support. The polyester content of the bra is recycled.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trousers in a cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a drawstring at the front. Zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with flounces, a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and ties at one side.

Short dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Cotton jersey vest top with a print motif on the front.
Chelsea boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Straight-cut V-neck dress in a crêpe weave. Small stand-up collar, pleats at the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Chinos in washed, stretch premium cotton twill with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in washed cotton canvas with an appliqué on the tongue, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a modal blend with a matt silk finish. Smocking and a drawstring at the waist and pockets in the side seams.
V-neck blouse in a soft viscose weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, ties at the neckline with tassels at the ends, and raglan butterfly sleeves that continue down the sides.

Leather weekend bag with two handles and a zip at the top, one handle with a detachable address tag. Detachable adjustable shoulder strap with a padded section. One zipped inner compartment, and studs on the base. Lined. Size approx. 22x27x48 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and rounded, slightly longer back. One top has an all-over print.
Short skirt in a textured weave with a high waist, detachable belt and a concealed zip and button at one side. Unlined.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with two round hammered metal pendants. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, thin, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets. No buttons.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in a knit containing glittery threads. Hat with a bow on the front and ribbed hem.
Short top in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a zip in one side and wide lace trim at the hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a Tencel™ lyocell and linen weave. Satin lapels with a sheen, welt front pockets and an inner pocket with a concealed button. Slightly longer sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Satin lining.
Sleeveless top in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Oversized jumper in a soft, chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with close-fitting cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front, long sleeves and an elasticated hem.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Jacket in soft pile with a hood with sewn-on ears, a zip down the front and side pockets in the shape of paws. Unlined.
Padded satin bomber jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Raglan sleeves with a quilted heart pattern and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Straight-cut jersey dress in a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Front pockets and slits in the sides of the hem.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a sequined heart on the front.

Short dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a kangaroo pocket, hood with embroidery and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.

Short dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and large kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders and long, voluminous sleeves with ribbed cuffs. The polyester content of the dress in recycled.
Striped leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges. V-shaped waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and an extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets, fake jetted pockets with a button at the back, and straight legs with creases down the front.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and zipped front pockets for safe storage of valuables. Extra-long sleeves with thumbholes to help keep you warm while exercising outside. The sleeves are in a raglan cut to minimise the risk of friction from the seams.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with a wide lace trim, low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Top in woven fabric with lace details, wide shoulder straps and a deep V-neck front and back.
Skirt in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), visible button fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Blouse in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Concealed buttons at the top and a small stand-up collar with a frill that continues down the button band. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back and long, voluminous sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Short skirt in a soft weave made from a viscose blend with smocking and a frill trim at the top, and pockets in the side seams.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Short, cold shoulder wrap dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, short flounced sleeves and ties at the side. Flounce at the top that continues around the back, down the front and around the hem. Unlined.
Lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Short-sleeved romper suit in striped, slub-weave cotton with buttons down the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Patch pockets at the sides, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Dress in airy chiffon with butterfly sleeves, an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Short skirt in a soft weave with pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Oversized shirt in washed denim with pearly press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke front and back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Fully lined printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and low-cut back with lacing.
Blouse in a cotton crêpe weave with a grandad collar, button placket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Mesh gym bag with a drawstring at the top. Can be carried like a backpack. Polyester lining. Size 40x45 cm.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Parka in woven fabric with a rounded collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap front patch pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and shimmering imitation leather pendant.

Rain jacket in patterned, water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front, and flap side pockets. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring.

Mesh blouse with an embroidered pattern, sequins, a small V-neck and ties at the neckline. Frilled yoke front and back and short sleeves with a frill trim. The blouse is lined with a jersey strappy top.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood and zip with a chin guard at the front. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Shirt in premium cotton with a grandad collar, French front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour trims.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with gathers and short, narrow shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck. Opening with a wrapover at the back, seam at the waist, side pockets, and long, wide legs. Unlined.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
